content: Actually, each cell does contain a binary digit, as one bit is roughly equivalent to 1 and an empty cell in the memory signifies 0. A single binary digit can only hold two possible values: a zero or a one.
stemmed: actual , cell contain binari digit , one bit roughli equival 1 empti cell memori signifi 0 . A singl binari digit hold two possibl valu : zero one .
